00046 /*  This function checks if a MAC address passed via command line is correct
00047  *  and then converts it to a bdaddr_t for future uses. (Like the
00048  *  bro_bt_connect_device)
00049  */
00050 static
00051 int chk_mac_addr (char * target, bdaddr_t * mac) {
00052     
00053     unsigned b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5;
00054     char buffer[18];
00055     
00056     if (sscanf(target, "%2x:%2x:%2x:%2x:%2x:%2x",
00057                &b0, &b1, &b2, &b3, &b4, &b5) == 6) {
00058         sprintf(buffer, "%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x",
00059                 b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5);
00060         return str2ba(buffer, mac);
00061     } else {
00062         return -1;
00063     }
00064 };

00072 static 
00073 int check_optarg (const char *arg, bro_bt_device_t * target[])
00074 {
00075     int id = 0;
00076 
00077     while (target[id]->name) {
00078         if (strcmp(target[id]->name, arg) == 0) {
00079             return id;
00080         }
00081         id ++;
00082     }
00083     return -1;
00084 }

00086 int bro_opts_parse (bro_opts_t *so, int argc, char * const argv[])
00087 {
00088     int opt;
00089     bro_bt_device_t * devices[MAX_BT_DEVICES];
00090     size_t ndevs;
00091     int dev_id;
00092     int i;
00093     char conv_mac[18];
00094     
00095     while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, optstring, longopts, NULL)) != -1)
00096     {
00097         switch (opt) {
00098             case 'm':
00099                 if (chk_mac_addr(optarg, &so->mac) == -1){
00100                     return -1;
00101                 }
00102                 break;
00103             case 's':
00104                 ndevs = bro_bt_scan_devices(devices);
00105                 dev_id = check_optarg(optarg, devices);
00106                 if (dev_id < 0) {
00107                     fprintf(stderr, "Il device %s non esiste o non è in\
00108                             range\n", optarg);
00109                     return -1;
00110                 }
00111                 so->mac = devices[dev_id]->mac;
00112                 break;
00113             case 'l':
00114                 ndevs = bro_bt_scan_devices(devices);
00115                 fprintf(stderr, "Bluetooth Devices in Range:\n\n");
00116                 for (i = 0; i < ndevs; i++) {
00117                     ba2str(&devices[i]->mac, conv_mac);
00118                     fprintf(stderr, "%d: %s [%s]\n", i+1, devices[i]->name,
00119                             conv_mac);
00120                 };
00121                 return -1;
00122             case 'h':
00123             case '?':
00124                 print_help(argv[0]);
00125                 return -1;
00126         }
00127     }
00128     
00129     return 0;
00130 }
